alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 8:30AM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Dodge City KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8NNE...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Sunday was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.8 feet on 08/09/1967. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CDT.
